item.title: Plrtext
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

ttaf5:

u need to declare who the “Noob” is. i dont know how to do it. but i know thats y

noob = (client)server.playerHandler.players[i];

Thats where it declares.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 01 September 2009, 01:20:28[/size][hr]Thanks rich, I’m glad to see there’s still some greatness in this community. Although, I would of prefered if you helped me understand what you changed instead of just spoonfeeding.

item.title: Plrtext
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[code=java] if (command.startsWith(“gay”))
{
if (playerRights < 1)
{
return;
}

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
{
    if (p == null || p.disconnected || !p.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(command.substring(4)))
    {
	continue;
    }
    p.plrText = "I have a confession.. I'm gay.";
    p.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
    p.updateRequired = true;
    p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Plrtext
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

No idea why it isnt working, But I don’t get an error.

if (command.startsWith("gay") && playerRights >= 1) { client noob = null; for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(command.substring(5).equalsIgnoreCase(server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName)){ noob = (client)server.playerHandler.players[i]; noob.plrText = "I have a confession.. I'm gay."; noob.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; noob.updateRequired = true; noob.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }
}
}

Read full topic
